front.title: A Solution for providing inter-AS MPLS-based QoS tunnels

abstract.t: This document describes a solution for providing inter-AS MPLS-based Quality of Service (QoS) tunnels. This solution makes use of Path Computation Elements (PCE) as a means to compute inter-domain constraint-based paths. Service considerations and agreements between two IP Network Providers (INP) implementing this solution are also described.
